problem.p: Which of the following models did you find to be the most difficult to use? If you found several to be equally difficult, check all of them.

checkboxgroup.submitted_message: Thank you for submitting your response.

choice.name: Dynamics
choice.text: The Dynamics and Net Force model.

choice.name: Momentum
choice.text: The Mechanical Energy and Work model.

choice.name: Torque
choice.text: The Rotational Dynamics and Net Torque model.

choice.name: AngMom
choice.text: The Angular Momentum and Angular Impulse model.

problem.p: Can you explain why you found this model to be difficult?

stringresponse.answer: It's a survey. There is no right answer.
